title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers. Same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat, or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style). Runs in Docker; supports multi-user, RAG, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Synchronous & async APIs, streaming, embeddings, custom options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example that pairs Ollama embeddings with FAISS for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) for Ollama written in Rust. Chat, manage models, view logs offline.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows, macOS, Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel; supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Official Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installations on macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama in a container for CI-based LLM testing or doc generation.
